# Authoring tools

Our professional product documentation uses several authoring tools.

Currently, we use:

- [MkDocs - Material](https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/)
- [Quarto](https://quarto.org/)
- [Pandoc Markdown](https://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#pandocs-markdown)


| Product        | Authoring tool    |
|----------------|:------------------|
| docs.posit.co  | MkDocs Material   |
| Connect        | MkDocs Material   |
| Package Manager        | MkDocs Material   |
| Workbench        | Quarto  |
| Shiny Server Pro        | Pandoc Markdown   |
